name: NPC
description: Overview: NPC (Non-Playable Character) is a fun and creative project that combines cryptocurrency with internet meme culture. Using memes, NPC aims to make complex crypto concepts more understandable and engaging for everyone, from beginners to experts. The project uses humor to educate people about blockchain, NFTs, DeFi, and more, while building a community that shares, creates, and enjoys crypto memes. Mission: NPC's mission is to make crypto fun and accessible by using memes. We simplify crypto ideas in a way that everyone can understand, while bringing people together through humor and shared experiences.
